title: Beach-Specific Information

fields.label: City
fields.name: city
fields.instructions: City where beach is located

fields.label: Coordinates
fields.name: coordinates
fields.instructions: Latitude, Longitude (comma-separated)

fields.label: Full Address
fields.name: full_address
fields.instructions: Complete street address

fields.label: Peak Cell Count
fields.name: peak_count
fields.instructions: Highest cell count from sampling sites (cells/L)

fields.label: Confidence Score
fields.name: confidence_score
fields.instructions: Data confidence percentage (0-100)

fields.label: Sample Date
fields.name: sample_date
fields.instructions: Date of most recent HAB sample

fields.label: Parent City
fields.name: parent_city_post
fields.instructions: Link to the parent city post

fields.label: Parent Region
fields.name: parent_region_post
fields.instructions: Link to the parent region post

fields.label: HAB Sampling Sites
fields.name: sampling_sites
fields.instructions: Sampling sites that contribute to this beach's status

sub_fields.label: Distance (miles)
sub_fields.name: distance_miles
sub_fields.instructions: Distance from beach to sampling site

description: Fields specific to individual beach monitoring

title: Red Tide Core Information

fields.label: Current Status
fields.name: current_status
fields.instructions: Current red tide status

fields.label: Status Color
fields.name: status_color
fields.instructions: Color associated with current status (auto-populated)

fields.label: Last Updated
fields.name: last_updated
fields.instructions: When this data was last processed

fields.label: URL Slug
fields.name: url_slug
fields.instructions: Auto-generated SEO-friendly URL

fields.label: Region
fields.name: region
fields.instructions: Geographic region (e.g., Southwest Florida)

fields.label: Featured Location
fields.name: featured_location
fields.instructions: Show prominently on homepage and category pages

description: Core fields shared across all red tide post types

title: Region Aggregate Data

fields.label: Peak Cell Count
fields.name: peak_count
fields.instructions: Highest count across all region beaches

fields.label: Average Cell Count
fields.name: avg_count
fields.instructions: Average count across all region beaches

fields.label: Average Confidence
fields.name: confidence_score
fields.instructions: Average confidence across all region beaches

fields.label: Latest Sample Date
fields.name: sample_date
fields.instructions: Most recent sample date across all region beaches

fields.label: Total Beaches
fields.name: beach_count
fields.instructions: Number of beaches monitored in this region

fields.label: Total Cities
fields.name: city_count
fields.instructions: Number of cities in this region

fields.label: Beaches - Safe
fields.name: beaches_safe
fields.instructions: Number of beaches with safe status

fields.label: Beaches - Caution
fields.name: beaches_caution
fields.instructions: Number of beaches with caution status

fields.label: Beaches - Avoid
fields.name: beaches_avoid
fields.instructions: Number of beaches with avoid status

fields.label: Child Cities
fields.name: child_cities
fields.instructions: Cities located in this region

fields.label: Child Beaches
fields.name: child_beaches
fields.instructions: All beaches in this region

fields.label: Region Description
fields.name: region_description
fields.instructions: Brief description of this region for SEO and user information
fields.placeholder: Southwest Florida is the primary region affected by red tide blooms, encompassing popular destinations like Sarasota, Fort Myers, and Naples.

description: Aggregate data fields for region-level red tide monitoring
